title: Jeb: 大多数1.11特性已经开发完成
author: zx728925
txt_content:
本帖最后由 bobby825 于 2016-8-26 08:34 编辑 

MegaVSPrime：How likely is it that  the weekend after minecon the first snapshot of 1.11 with new features be released?
MegaVSPrime：有多大可能在Minecon 2016后的周末发布1.11带有已经发布过的新特性的第一个快照？（有可能是指预发布版）
Jeb：Although most features are already are done, many of us will take a vacation after Minecon, so I can't answer that right now
Jeb：虽然大多数的特性已经开发完成了，但是我们开发人员中，许多人会在Minecon 2016后放一个假，所以我此时不能回答你




QQ截图20160825235414.png (38.43 KB, 下载次数: 6)
